activities:
Veristream (Infrasafe) a subsidiary of Advantor Systems uses personal information entered by users to register visitors to buildings managed by subscribers. The online service, iVisitor, is the product by which users enter and access personal information. The information collected may include names, phone numbers and e-mail addresses.
    Veristream uses reasonable administrative, technical, personnel and physical measures to safeguard possession against loss, theft, unauthorized use, and disclosure or modification. The information and service is hosted in a secure data center.
    Advantor Systems is engaged in the design, distribution, integration, installation, training and servicing of security systems that combine physical security for facilities with information security to protect people, confidential information and other critical assets directly to the US Government and commercial customers throughout the United States and internationally.
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program)
